results.content: Well planned and explained. However, I expected to see how the sign up and contacts are managed on the website container when clients fill those forms. A demonstration on how those forms will work in real life would be great.

results.content: The tutor takes you on a comprehensive journey through web development as a beginner I found it very easy to follow and the thought that the tutor was very clear at every part of the course. He also echos at the end of every lecture that he will answer any questions if you have them which I did and got the answers I need which helped me continue my studies. There are many resources that the tutor mentions that are quite useful to look over in your spare time as well as aid you along on this course.

results.content:
Best for a newbie... 
I am a Front End Web Developer myself, with 3 years of experience,  watched the first section of the tutorials... 
It covers all the important concepts, Though few concepts (like cookie in meta tag) are no longer used.

But overall great great Course for some one who wants to start the Web Development Career.
Highly recommended folks.

Thank you for the course :)
